name: Pandactilo 0.1
description:
A game for all your fingers

Pandáctilo concerns who uses all his fingers, and that's just this game is, designed for learning or practicing the typing, digit letters and words on a game play, this is a fun way to test your skills at the keyboard.

In this game you're not going to lose, just play all levels again and again until you become a master PANDACTILO

Music, drawings and programming by Munguia
I made this game back in 2010 with game Maker, now i can convert those .exe games intro HTML5, is the same game back in those days
